articles.title: Kim Jong Un Watches Night Naval Firepower Strike Drill of KPA
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Watches Night Naval Fire Strike Drill of KPA
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, watched night naval fire strike drill of navy warship sub-unit and ground artillery sub-units.
					 Involved in the drill were ground artillery sub-units under the KPA 10th Corps and various type combat warships of the East Sea Fleet of the KPA Navy.
					
					 Kim Jong Un was briefed on the real time sea monitoring and firepower command system device newly studied and developed by the KPA before mounting an observation post. 
					
					He heard the reports of the commander of the KPA 10th Corps and the commander of the East Sea Fleet of the KPA Navy on their determination to fulfill their duties to make night firepower strikes and issued an order  to start the drill.
					
					 Naval bombardment was kicked off and various type ground artillery pieces including multiple rockets opened fire at the "enemy" warships intruding into the waters of the DPRK all of a sudden under the cover of pitch darkness and dense fog.
					
					 He was pleased to watch the artillery pieces and warships mercilessly hit the naval targets through rapid firing and volley of firing. He appreciated their high concentrated firing, adding shells seemed to have eyes. 
					
					 He was satisfied with the successful night fire strike drill staged under the operational plan and intention of the supreme command.
					
					 The drill could prove successful thanks to the positive efforts made by the commanding officers of the KPA to bring about a turning phase in rounding off the combat preparations.
					
					 Noting that the KPA's study and development of the real-time naval monitoring and firepower commanding system are of weighty importance in staging trainings under the simulated conditions of an actual war and putting them on a scientific and modern basis, he said the KPA has settled military scientific and technological issues capable of putting all enemy moves under control and wiping out all of them in the territorial waters of the country.
					
					 He highly praised the officials and researchers of the unit managed by Nam In Bok for contributing to providing a firm military guarantee for successfully defending the territorial waters and conducting naval battles.
					
					 He set forth the tasks to be fulfilled which would serve as guidelines for taking the Juche-based military idea of Generalissimos, Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and their behests as the eternal guiding principles and carry out them to the letter and developing the KPA into elite revolutionary powerful army.
					
					 He was accompanied by Hwang Pyong So, Pak Yong Sik, Ryom Chol Song, Yun Tong Yun, Pak Jong Chon and Hong Yong Chil.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Taekwon-Do Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Taekwon-Do Delegation
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, met and had a talk with a Taekwon-Do delegation headed by Leong Wai Meng, vice-president of the International Taekwon-Do Federation, which paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Tuesday.

articles.title: Indonesian Embassy Officials Give Helping Hand to Korean Farm
articles.content:
Indonesian Embassy Officials Give Helping Hand to Korean Farm
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- Bambang Hiendrasto, Indonesian ambassador to the DPRK, and his embassy officials Tuesday did friendship labor at the DPRK-Indonesia Friendship Yaksu Cooperative Farm in Kangso District.
					 The guests went round the room dedicated to the history of the farm after being briefed on the leadership feats of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu associated with the farm.
					
					They gave a helping hand to farmers.
					
					 Embassy officials handed over aid materials to the farm.

articles.title: Severe Drought Hits DPRK
articles.content:
Severe Drought Hits DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- The worst drought in 100 years continues in the DPRK, causing great damage to its agricultural field.
					 According to data available, rice-transplanting has been finished in over 441,560 hectares of paddy fields across the country as of June 8, but at least 136,200 hectares of them are parching up.
					
					 The granaries including North and South Hwanghae provinces and South Phyongan and South Hamgyong provinces have been badly damaged.
					
					 Drought dries up rice-seedlings in nearly 80 percent and 58 percent of paddy fields in South and North Hwanghae provinces.
					
					 According to the State Hydro-meteorological Administration, no rainfall has been witnessed in North and South Hwanghae provinces.
					
					 Water level of reservoirs stands at the lowest, while rivers and streams getting dry.
					
					 Other crops are planted in paddy fields of drought-stricken areas as part of the campaign to reduce damage.

articles.title: DPRK Football Team Beats Its Uzbek Rival 4:2
articles.content:
DPRK Football Team Beats Its Uzbek Rival 4:2
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- The DPRK football team played its home match with its Uzbek rival on Tuesday at Kim Il Sung Stadium here as part of the second-round Asian regional preliminaries in Group H for the 2018 FIFA World Cup.
					 The DPRK team beat the rival 4:2.
					
					 Earlier, the DPRK team won its Yemeni rival 1:0 in Qatar.

articles.title: New Kind of Feed Additive Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
New Kind of Feed Additive Developed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- The Zootechny Institute under the Academy of Agricultural Science in the DPRK recently developed mineral feed additive for livestock.
					 This additive helps minimize the morbidity of livestock and boost the productivity of meat and milk as it contains essential macronutrients and microelements. 
					
					 It has already been applied to various stockbreeding bases and co-op farms, proving very effective.

articles.title: On-site Medical Service Brisk on Co-op Farms
articles.content:
On-site Medical Service Brisk on Co-op Farms
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- Medical institutions at all levels in the DPRK have provided on-site medical service on co-op farms where rice-transplanting are now under way.
					 Medical workers of hospitals and clinics in rural areas are taking the lead in this campaign, encouraging farmers and volunteers.
					
					 In particular, medical workers of Sinwon County in South Hwanghae Province, Songchon County in South Phyongan Province and Ryongchon County in North Phyongan Province are rendering hygienic information service while running medical detachments by themselves.
					
					 Medical institutions including hygienic and anti-epidemic centers are giving priority to the supply of medicaments to rural areas.

articles.title: Making of Soy and Bean Paste, National Intangible Heritage
articles.content:
Making of Soy and Bean Paste, National Intangible Heritage
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- Making of soy and bean paste is registered as one of the national intangible heritages in the DPRK.
					 The Koreans have long taken soy and bean paste as side dish or spices, which are considered to be peculiar foodstuff of the nation showing its  wisdom and food culture.
					
					 The long history of soy and bean paste is evidenced by the records on Koguryo (B.C. 277-A.D. 668) tomb murals. At that time each family would make the soy and bean paste on its own way, regarding them as a precious thing decisive of its prosperity.
					
					 Bean paste is recently known to the world as one of the best health food which is effective in preventing cancer.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Holding Higher Banner of By Our Nation Itself
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Holding Higher Banner of By Our Nation Itself 
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- The idea of By Our Nation Itself set forth in the June 15 joint declaration is the idea of independence, idea of strong unity and idea of noble patriotism, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in an article. 
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The 15-year course of the struggle for reunification since the publication of the June 15 joint declaration goes to prove that the idea of By Our Nation Itself is the most powerful treasured sword for national reunification and the shining banner for the improvement of the inter-Korean relations. 
					
					 It is the immutable principle for the improvement of the inter-Korean relations and independent reunification to solve the country's reunification issue independently by the concerted efforts of the Korean nation responsible for it. 
					
					 However, the south Korean authorities brand the idea of By Our Nation Itself as "chauvinistic nationalism" and viciously challenge the DPRK's efforts for the mending of the north-south relations and national reunification. 
					
					 Recently the south Korean authorities let loose invectives against the DPRK, claiming that the north advocating the idea of By Our Nation Itself slandered the south. 
					
					 This is their sinister scenario to insult the noble and patriotic idea of By Our Nation Itself and totally stamp out the spirit of the June 15 joint declaration and realize their scheme for confrontation. 
					
					 It is necessary for the Korean nation to hold higher the banner of By Our Nation Itself to smash the provocations of the anti-reunification confrontation elements, improve inter-Korean relations and achieve independent reunification.

articles.title: U.S. Rhetoric about "Dialogue" Denounced
articles.content:
U.S. Rhetoric about "Dialogue" Denounced
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- The assistant secretary of the U.S. State for East Asia and Pacific Affairs recently said it is north Korea, not the U.S. which denies dialogue.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a commentary terms this shameless sophism making the profound confusing of right and wrong.
					
					 Outwardly, the U.S. cries out for "sincere dialogue" but behind the scene it gets frantic in saber-rattling against the north, the news analyst says, and goes on:
					
					 This proves the U.S. is not interested in dialogue and improvement of relations but is hell-bent on escalating confrontation and tension on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Due to the U.S. maneuver to stand in confrontation with the DPRK to the last, the situation on the Korean peninsula has been constantly tense, creating a danger that can lead to emergency any moment.
					
					 War and confrontation can never go together with dialogue and reconciliation.
					
					 Nothing can be expected from talks with those who carry dagger in their belt.
					
					 If the U.S. has true willingness to hold dialogue and improve relations with the DPRK, the former has to drop its anachronistic hostile policy toward the latter.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses S. Korean Regime of Using Epidemic Disease for Escalating Confrontation with DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses S. Korean Regime of Using Epidemic Disease for Escalating Confrontation with DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- Recently, the Mideast respiratory syndrome MERS is plunging the whole south Korean society into uneasiness and horror. As voices critical of incompetence of the authorities mounted among south Koreans, the Park Geun Hye regime is floating the fiction about "hacking by the north" by setting in motion KBS, a reptile media. It says the DPRK is being engaged in hacking after spreading vicious code in cyber space with MERS-related information as a lever.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 What is ridiculous, indeed, is the provocative acts of the south Korean puppet forces trying to use even epidemic disease as a pretext for escalating confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 The epidemic disease has reached such a serious phase in south Korea as the puppet group of traitors is utterly indifferent to the people's pain, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 Far from repenting of their faults and taking steps to control the situation, the puppet forces invented such fiction as "hacking by the north" in a bid to secure a pretext for doing harm to the fellow countrymen in the north and escalating confrontation with it. This has touched off people's resentment.
					
					 Whenever the puppet regime finds itself tight-cornered, it pulled up the DPRK. The above-said fiction makes one easily foresee the miserable fate of the group of traitors.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye regime is sadly mistaken if it thinks it can save south Korea from distress through such a poor burlesque.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Japan's Ambition for Reinvasion
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Japan's Ambition for Reinvasion 
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the U.S. Department of State approved a contract on the sale of four E-2D Hawk-Eyes and supportive hardware to Japan. Earlier, an organization under the U.S. Department of State approved a contract on selling 17 Ospreys, supportive equipment and submarine-launched missiles to Japan.
					 In January this year, Japan made public a master plan on space the keynote of which is the launch of 45 space bodies including satellites in a decade to come. 
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a commentary says in this regard:
					
					 This goes to clearly prove that the Japanese reactionaries' moves to turn Japan into a military giant and their moves for overseas expansion have reached a serious phase.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries say the buildup of military muscle is aimed to cope with the "increasing threat" from surrounding countries including the DPRK.
					
					 This illogical story does not stand to reason.
					
					 Japanese militarism has now been completely revived and rearmed. 
					
					 If the Samurai descendants seek to play with fire, obsessed with the ambition for reinvasion, they would meet catastrophic disaster and doom incomparable with what militarist Japan suffered seven decades ago.

articles.title: Japan's Settlement of Its Past Crimes Is Demand of Its People and History: Minju Joson
articles.content:
Japan's Settlement of Its Past Crimes Is Demand of Its People and History: Minju Joson
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- Kono, former speaker of the House of Representatives of Japan, expressed his view shortly ago that the present Japanese chief executive should specify the apology for the past crimes in the "Abe statement" to be published on the 70th anniversary of the end of the Second World War.
					 He stressed that among other things the truth about the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army can never be denied. Meanwhile, more than 280 Japanese intellectuals including honorary professor at University of Tokyo issued a statement in which they urged the present Japanese chief executive to carry forward the Kono statement and Murayama statement, which admitted and repented of the historical facts about the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army in a statement to be published by him on the upcoming 70th anniversary.
					
					 Minju Joson Tuesday in a commentary says for Japan to honestly admit and make apology and reparation is not the demand of victimized countries only but the demand of the Japanese and history.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 Lots of Japanese are urging the government to make a bold decision of liquidating the past at an early date because they are aware that it is an urgent issue for Japan itself, not an issue for others.
					
					 However, the present Japanese authorities, being buoyed by the ambition for military expansion overseas, are not lending an ear to the just demand of the people. 
					
					 They have to clearly understand that their improper stand and attitude towards the settlement of the past wrongs will never bring benefits to Japan as wished by them. Germany made sincere apology and reparation for its past crimes not because it was inferior to Japan.
					
					 German politicians did not mind making apology to the international community with their knees bent before it because they clearly knew that without settling its crime-woven past, they can never turn a new leaf.
					
					 They did so from the stand of taking responsibility for the destiny of the nation.
					
					 The Japanese authorities had better come to their senses and behave themselves, though belatedly.

articles.title: Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration Marked in S. Korea
articles.content:
Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration Marked in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- A meeting for national reunification took place in Jongro District, Seoul on June 14 to mark the 15th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration, according to Thongil News, an internet paper of south Korea.
					 Present there were more than 2,500 people including members of organizations, lawmakers of opposition parties and citizens.
					
					 The floor was taken by the permanent representative of the south side's preparatory committee for joint national event, the chairman of the Consultative Council of Religionists, the permanent representative of the Federation of Women's Organizations, the chairman of the Confederation of Trade Unions and a lawmaker from the Democratic Alliance for New Politics.
					
					 The speakers expressed regret at the separate holding of the June 15 joint national event, insisting that the Park Geun Hye regime is to blame for this.
					
					 If the authorities respect the joint declaration, they should prove it in practice and, to this end, make a switchover in their "policy toward the north", to begin with, they noted. They demanded the authorities meet with the north at an early date on the basis of the joint declaration to make open-hearted, unreserved and sincere discussion for reunification.
					
					 The August 15 joint national event being pushed forward to usher in another June 15 era of reunification is the one for the nation, they said.
					
					 An appeal of All-Korean Committee for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration was read out at the meeting.
					
					 At the end of the meeting the participants marched as far as Seoul Square holding slogan "Lift May 24 step and roll back policy toward north!"

articles.title: Japanese Civic Body Accuses Authorities of Trying to Cover up Japan's Past Crimes
articles.content:
Japanese Civic Body Accuses Authorities of Trying to Cover up Japan's Past Crimes
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- The Network for Probing Truth behind the Forcible Drafting, a Japanese civic body investigating the damage done by the Japanese imperialist's forcible drafting during their occupation of Korea, made public a statement in denunciation of the shameless acts of the Japanese authorities to cover up forcible drafting by the Japanese imperialists in the past, according to the south Korean KBS on June 13. 
					 The statement said the Japanese government is busy with the frantic moves to register the facilities bearing witness to damage done by conscription by the Japanese imperialists as world cultural heritage despite strong opposition at home and abroad.
					
					 A lot of Koreans lost their lives while doing forced labor at the Hashima Coal Mine which was proposed by Japan as world heritage, the statement ridiculed. 
					
					 In addition to this, the fact about the forcible drafting of Koreans is being disclosed among 23 old industrial facilities Japan proposed for the registration of the world cultural heritage, it added.

articles.title: Epidemic Spreads in S. Korea
articles.content:
Epidemic Spreads in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) --  An old man in his seventies infected with epidemic spread by wild tick died on Jeju Island on June 14, according to MBC of south Korea.
					 The epidemic occurred in South Chungchong Province, south Korea in May, too.
					
					 55 people were infected with the epidemic last year and 15 of them died.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Brings Case of Prime Minister-designate to Prosecution
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Brings Case of Prime Minister-designate to Prosecution
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- The Bar Association for Democratic Society of south Korea brought the case of Hwang Kyo An, prime minister-designate, to the Seoul Central District Prosecutor's Office on June 12, according to the south Korean CBS.
					 The organization disclosed the illegal acts committed by Hwang.

articles.title: S. Korean Body Demands Withdrawal of U.S. Forces
articles.content:
S. Korean Body Demands Withdrawal of U.S. Forces 
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- The Family Movement for Realizing Democracy in south Korea held an anti-U.S. and anti-regime meeting in Jongro District, Seoul on June 11, according to the south Korean internet paper Jaju Sibo.
					 Speakers said that the south, the north and abroad planned to hold a joint national event on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration and the 70th anniversary of August 15 liberation, but the present regime deliberately blocked it.
					
					 Though the joint national event was aborted, they would stage a dynamic struggle for implementing the June 15 joint declaration, they noted, demanding the authorities stop the moves to escalate the confrontation with compatriots and opt for improving the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The U.S. forces should be driven out of south Korea as they introduced botulinus germs 100,000 times more poisonous than anthrax germs into south Korea to conduct experiments in secrecy and sought to deploy THAAD into it though the Korean nation has no interest at all, they stressed.

articles.title: WPK Introduced by Foreign Figures
articles.content:
WPK Introduced by Foreign Figures
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- Round-table talks were held by the Communist Party in Sweden, a water project construction station of Ethiopia, an Ethiopian hospital and the Ministry of Public Health of Angola from June 5 to 10 on the occasion of the 51st anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The chairman of the Communist Party in Sweden said that the WPK could be an ever-victorious revolutionary party with the invincible might advancing along the road of independence despite all trials and difficulties thanks to the great idea and leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					Officials of the water project construction station of Ethiopia said that under the leadership of the WPK led by Kim Jong Il the DPRK could become a political and military power, adding the exploits he performed by developing the WPK into the ever-victorious steel-strong party will shine with the history of Juche Korea.
					
					 A vice-chairman of the Angola Doctor Association said that the proud history of the WPK is instilling confidence in victory and courage into the African people struggling for the building of a new society.

articles.title: Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration Observed in Ethiopia
articles.content:
Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration Observed in Ethiopia
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- A seminar took place by more than 10 branches of the Ethiopian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and round-table talks by the Ministry of Water Resources of the country between June 1 and 5 on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The adherents of the Juche idea of the branches said that supreme leader Kim Jong Un set forth the slogan "Let the whole nation join efforts to open up a broad avenue to independent reunification in this year of the 70th anniversary of national liberation!" in his New Year Address.
					
					 Saying it is something lamentable that the Korean nation has suffered from the pain of division for the past 70 years, they noted the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government advanced the important proposals for the country's reunification and made sincere efforts for their implementation but failed to achieve success due to the moves of the forces against reunification at home and abroad.
					
					 They stressed that it is the firm will of Kim Jong Un to achieve the country's reunification, lifetime goal of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and ardent desire of the Korean nation, at any cost and build a dignified and prosperous reunified power.
					
					 They expressed belief and conviction that a turning point of Korea's reunification will be provided this year.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Swiss Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Swiss Organization
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) has developed into the party of President Kim Il Sung under the leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea said this in a joint statement released on June 6 on the occasion of the 51st anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the WPK.
					
					 The statement noted:
					
					 When Kim Jong Il started his work at the Central Committee of the WPK, he regarded it as the greatest pleasure that he could attend on Kim Il Sung and could relieve him of his burdens.
					
					 He energetically led the work for establishing the monolithic ideological system of the leader in the whole party against machinations of the modern revisionists.
					
					 The idea and line of Kim Il Sung were fully applied to all fabrics of social life.
					
					 The days when Kim Jong Il started his work at the C.C., WPK were a decisive period in building the party and defending Korean-style socialism.

articles.title: Nepali Political Parties, Organizations Support Korea's Reunification
articles.content:
Nepali Political Parties, Organizations Support Korea's Reunification
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- 15 political parties and organizations of Nepal released a joint statement on June 8 on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration in Korea. They included the Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist), Nepal Communist Party (United), Nepal-Korea Friendship Association, Nepal Journalist Association, Nepalese Association for Supporting the Songun Politics and the Study Forum for Self-Reliance of Nepal. 
					 Under the title "Political parties and public organizations of Nepal urge all countries concerned to sincerely implement the June 15 north-south joint declaration adopted in June, 2000", the statement noted:
					
					 We regard the publication of historic north-south joint declaration as a significant event of opening up a bright prospect for the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea and express belief that all Koreans in the north, the south and abroad would achieve the country's reunification without fail through reconciliation and cooperation. 
					
					 Once again urging all countries concerned to sincerely honor the spirit of the historic north-south joint declarations, we demand that the U.S. forces equipped with nuclear weapons be driven out of south Korea, the concrete wall that artificially divides the Korean nation into two be removed and various kinds of war drills for aggression be stopped.

articles.title: National Traditions of Korea Introduced by Bangladeshi Newspaper
articles.content:
National Traditions of Korea Introduced by Bangladeshi Newspaper
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- The Bangladeshi newspaper Daily Folk on June 9 carried an article titled "National traditions of Korea".
					 The newspaper said that there are pervasive public efforts and activities in the DPRK for carrying forward and developing the excellent traditions and culture of the nation.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The Korean costume is one of the cultural heritages of the nation with long history reflecting the emotion of the Korean nation.
					
					 In particular, chima (skirt) and jogori (jacket) which are often worn by the Korean women are well-known in the world.
					
					 The Korean people are boasting of their national pride and self-esteem while enjoying their national clothes and food and singing their folk songs.
					
					 The admirable traditions and advantages of the nation are being demonstrated in the world. It is the fruition of the wise leadership of the great leaders who regarded it as an important work linked with the destiny of the nation to glorify advantageous traditions and culture of the nation.

articles.title: Seminars on Kim Jong Il's Exploits Held Abroad
articles.content:
Seminars on Kim Jong Il's Exploits Held Abroad
 Pyongyang, June 16 (KCNA) -- Seminars on leader Kim Jong Il's exploits took place in Mongolia, Sweden and Uganda from June 4 to 10 to mark the 51st anniversary of his start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 On display at the venues of the seminars were photos dealing with the exploits President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed in party building and Marshal Kim Jong Un's Songun leadership feats.
					
					 Also displayed there were their works, and books and photos introducing the struggle of the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 The general secretary of the National Democratic Party of Mongolia noted that Kim Jong Il paid great attention to the ideological work and firmly consolidated the unity and cohesion of the whole party based on the leader's idea from the early period of his work at the WPK Central Committee.
					
					 The secretary general of the Uganda National Resistance Movement and other speakers said that Kim Jong Il developed the WPK into the strongest political organization in the world and turned the DPRK into an invulnerable socialist fortress.
					
					 The chief of the Swedish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea said that Kim Jong Il firmly defended the sovereignty of the DPRK and socialism by dint of original Songun politics and laid firm foundations for building a thriving nation.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar held in Sweden.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia entrenamiento nocturno de golpe maritimo de subunidades de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia entrenamiento nocturno de golpe maritimo de subunidades de EPC
Pyongyang, 16 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, presencio el entrenamiento nocturno de golpe maritimo de subunidades de buques de guerra de marina y subunidades de artilleria terrestre del EPC.
					En la ocasion participaron subunidades de artilleria terrestre adscritas al decimo cuerpo y buques de guerra de diferentes tipos de la flota del Mar Este de las fuerzas navales, del EPC.
					
					El Mariscal escucho la explicacion sobre la composicion del sistema de vigilancia maritima en el tiempo real y de direccion de tiro, desarrollado nuevamente por el EPC y subio al puesto de vigilancia.
					
					Tras recibir el parte de decision del jefe del decimo cuerpo y el jefe de la flota del Mar Este de la marina para el cumplimiento de mision de golpe nocturno con fuegos, el Mariscal dio la orden de comienzo.
					
					Los canones de cubierta y canones terrestres de todos tipos inclusive los lanzacohetes reactivos autopropulsados abrieron fuego por turno contra los buques "enemigos" infiltrados inesperadamente a nuestro mar aprovechandose de la ocasion en que no se puede ver nada por la oscuridad y espesa niebla.
					
					Al ver los blancos maritimos que se destruian por el tiro rapido y el fuego colectivo, el Mariscal se puso alegre por la exactitud y el nivel de convergencia de tiro.
					
					Y expreso la satisfaccion de que el entrenamiento nocturno fue realizado con exito conforme al proyecto estrategico y la voluntad de la Comandancia Suprema.
					
					El exito de entrenamiento es el resultado de esfuerzos de los comandantes del EPC para abrir una fase de viraje en la preparacion de combate, apunto.
					
					El desarrollo del sistema de vigilancia maritima en el tiempo real y de direccion de tiro por el EPC tiene gran significacion para hacer el entrenamiento como en el combate real y cientifizarlo y modernizarlo, dijo y continuo que resolvieron otro nuevo problema cientifico y tecnico de los asuntos militares para que puedan controlar y aniquilar totalmente a los enemigos que hacen malas jugadas en nuestro mar territorial.
					
					Y evaluo mucho los meritos de los funcionarios e investigadores de la unidad perteneciente a Nam In Bok que aportaron a preparar la firme garantia militar para realizar con exito la defensa del mar territorial y el combate maritimo.
					
					Presento las tareas que sirven de guia para materializar hasta el final la autoctona idea militar y el legado de los grandes Lideres, tomandolos como eterna guia directiva, y fortalecer el EPC como ejercito revolucionario de flor y nata.
					
					El Mariscal fue acompanado por Hwang Pyong So, Pak Yong Sik, Ryom Chol Song, Yun Tong Hyon, Pak Jong Chon y Hong Yong Chil.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con delegacion de taekwondocas
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con delegacion de taekwondocas
Pyongyang, 16 de junio (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, departio este martes en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con la delegacion de taekwondocas presidida por el vicepresidente de la Federacion Internacional de Taekwondo (ITF en ingles), Leong Wai Meng, que le hizo una visita de cortesia.

articles.title: Campos rurales sufren por sequia severa
articles.content:
Campos rurales sufren por sequia severa
Pyongyang, 16 de junio (ACNC) -- Debido a la sequia severa de este ano durante cien anos ultimos, los campos rurales a lo largo de este pais sufren graves danos.
					Segun datos estadisticos, hasta el dia 8 se secan en escala nacional las posturas de arroz de mas de 136 mil 200 hectareas, de entre mas de 441 mil 560 hectareas transplantados con posturas de arroz.
					
					Las regiones que sufrieron mucho por ese fenomeno nacional son las provincias de Hwanghae del Sur y del Norte y las provincias de Phyong-an del Sur reconocidas como graneros y Hamgyong del Sur.
					
					En particular, casi 80% de las areas trasplantadas con posturas de arroz de la provincia de Hwanghae del Sur y casi 58% de la provincia de Hwanghae del Norte se encuentran sin agua. 
					
					Segun la informacion de la Direccion Meteorologica e Hidrologica, en estos ultimos dias llovieron en todas las zonas del pais, pero casi no se cayeron las lluvias en las provincias de Hwanghae del Sur y el Norte.
					
					Se disminuye el maximo nivel de agua de los embalses y los rios se encuentran en estado casi seco, lo cual influencia negativamente no solo a las posturas de arroz transplantadas sino tambien a otros cultivos tales como el maiz.
					
					Dado que se aumentan las areas danadas por la sequia, respectivas regiones toman las medidas necesarias para superar la sequia tales como sembrar otros cultivos en vez de las posturas de arroz.

articles.title: Liquidacion de pasado criminal de Japon es demanda de opinion publica e historia, apunta Minju Joson
articles.content:
Liquidacion de pasado criminal de Japon es demanda de opinion publica e historia, apunta Minju Joson
Pyongyang, 16 de junio (ACNC) -- Hace poco, el ex presidente de la dieta de Japon, Kono, expuso su criterio de que el gobernador actual debe anotar la palabra "disculpa" sobre los crimenes del pasado en la "declaracion de Abe" a publicarse en ocasion del 70o aniversario del fin de guerra.
					  Especialmente, subrayo que no se puede negar la verdad del crimen de esclavitud sexual del ex ejercito japones.
					
					  Por otra parte, mas de 280 intelectuales japoneses incluyendo el profesor honorario de la Universidad de Tokio publicaron una declaracion demandando que en su declaracion dedicada al 70o aniversario del fin de la guerra el gobernador actual suceda las declaraciones de Kono y Murayama que reconocieron y reflexionaron sobre el hecho historico del crimen arriba mencionado.
					
					  Reconocer, pedir disculpa y hacer indemnizacion sinceramente sobre su crimen del pasado devienen la demanda no solo de los paises danados sino tambien de la opinion publica de Japon y la historia.
					
					  Asi asevera el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual difundido este martes y prosigue:
					
					Muchos japoneses se dieron cuenta de que la liquidacion del pasado es el asunto urgente para ellos mismos mas que para otros, razon por la cual insisten en que el gobierno debe tomar cuanto antes la decision audaz sobre el respecto.
					
					  Pero, las autoridades japonesas actuales, enloquecidas por la ambicion militarista de expansion a ultramar, no prestan sus oidos a la demanda justa de la opinion publica.
					
					  Las autoridades japonesas deben tener presente que su posicion y proceder malsanos sobre la liquidacion del pasado no les daran ningun interes segun sus deseos.
					
					  Alemania opto el camino de la disculpa sincera y la indemnizacion sobre su crimen del pasado, porque es mas inteligente que Japon.
					
					  Los politicos alemanes pidieron perdon de buena gana ante la sociedad internacional porque se dieron cuenta de que no pueden comenzar la nueva partida sin liquidar el pasado. 
					
					  Son asi los politicos que tienen la posicion de encargarse del destino de la nacion.
					
					  Las autoridades japonesas deben actuar con conciencia  aunque sea ahora mismo.
